mapper.select: select r.id, r.flash_promotion_price, r.flash_promotion_count, r.flash_promotion_limit, r.flash_promotion_id, r.flash_promotion_session_id, r.product_id, r.sort, p.id p_id, p.'name' p_name, p.product_sn p_product_sn, p.price p_price, p.stock p_stock from sms_flash_promotion_product_relation r left join pms_product p on r.product_id = p.id where r.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} and r.flash_promotion_session_id = #{flashPromotionSessionId} order by r.sort desc
